title: Five of Pentacles Meaning - Tarot Card Meanings

Comparing the Five of Pentacles across different tarot decks.

description:
Just like the fives of the other suits in the tarot, the Five of Pentacles symbolizes adversity. It shows two individuals walking outside while it is snowing. Not only are they cold, they are also sick, poor, tired, and hungry. It looks as if they are lacking the basic necessities of life. A lot of people can relate to the two individuals in more ways than one.
One of the individuals in the card has crutches, while the other figure has a shawl covering her head. She is walking barefoot in the snow. There is a black wall in the background with a stained glass window featuring the five pentacles, suggesting a church of some kind.
More often than not, the Five of Pentacles is a bad omen. However, do not fret, as it can change depending on where it is placed in the reading.

upright.overview:
Whenever the Five of Pentacles shows up in a reading, it suggests a time of hardship and insecurity. The meaning of this card can be deep loneliness, illness, poverty or loss. Your status might take a turn for the worse in the near future. There is a chance that you will lose something significant, whether it is financial wealth or an important item. Deterioration of your health might be already ongoing or be very sudden.

There is a chance that you will lose something significant, whether it is financial wealth or an important item.

The person with crutches has a lot of symbolism. This person may be feeling cursed - that their bad luck is something that they can’t shake off easily. The Five of Pentacles symbolism can also be that of old debts, high credit card balances, or unpaid loans. It is a reminder that you should consider sorting out your finances. Mistakes you have made in the past might also haunt you.
The Five of Pentacles is not a good sign when it comes to questions relating to love. It can be an indicator that the person you love is not feeling the same way. And just like the figures on the card, you might feel like you were left out in the cold.
upright.love_meaning: It may seem right now that you’ll never find the love you are searching for with the 5 of Pentacles tarot love meaning. Singles may be in a period of despair, ready to give up their long search for the right partner and give into their loneliness. Unfortunately, this attitude can be a self-fulfilling prophecy. Feelings of isolation or scarcity can appear in existing relationships as well, whether it comes from within one’s partnership or outside of it. Lovers may find it difficult to communicate honestly, or be emotionally close to their partners, creating a wall between one another. Depression may be an issue as well. Sometimes this card can signal a lack of financial security, creating strain in your romantic relationships. This may be a difficult time, but it is more important than ever to draw close together, instead of pulling apart.
upright.career_meaning: The 5 of Pentacles appearing in a career or work context can spell trouble. You may be going through a period of hardship at work, perhaps through losing a job, or feeling alone and abandoned at work by colleagues or bosses. Others may treat you like an outcast, and you may struggle with office politics and being social. If you’re a business owner, you may also be struggling. All these issues may be severely affecting your mental health, and it can be a downward spiral. If you believe that this situation won’t change, you may want to start looking for another job.
upright.finances_meaning: Financial hardship is represented by the 5 of Pentacles. You’ll need to pinch pennies and stretch your dollars right now, since money feels very tight. Sometimes, in the worst case, this card can also suggest material loss, so you may also be dealing with debt, bankruptcy or evictions. so expect money to be tight when it appears. Whatever the situation, don’t let your pride stop you from asking for help. Look into soup kitchens and charities if you need to; there should be no shame in doing so, we all go through tough times financially. If you can, you may want to start putting together an emergency fund.
upright.as_feelings:
The upright Five of Pentacles unveils a landscape rich with emotional complexity. If you’re wondering how this person feels about you, they may be wrestling with feelings of isolation and insecurity. They might sense a lack of support or connection between you, leaving them feeling abandoned or overlooked. Their struggles could cloud their emotions, making it hard for them to fully engage in the relationship.
When this card reflects your own feelings, it indicates that you too may be facing similar sentiments of inadequacy and worry. You might feel as if you're navigating challenges alone, craving reassurance and comfort from those around you. This shared vulnerability opens the door to deeper understanding if both parties are willing to acknowledge these feelings together.
upright.as_actions: This card carries the weight of seeking support and recognizing your own resilience. This card encourages you to shift your perspective from isolation to connection. Reach out to friends or family for assistance, whether emotional or practical, as collaboration can lead to new opportunities. Consider volunteering or joining a community group; these actions not only help others but also foster a sense of belonging and purpose in your life. Embrace gratitude for what you have while actively pursuing resources that can improve your situation, reminding yourself that even in tough times, hope and support are within reach.
upright.career: work hardships, isolation from colleagues, outcast

reversed.overview:
Unlike the upright version, the Five of Pentacles reversal meaning can be a positive one. The snow is now on top, which represents brightness coming into your life. The stained glass now symbolizes a passageway with the Pentacles serving as the light at the end of the tunnel. The reversed Five of Pentacles means change is coming.
When drawing this card, it can mean that the worst is now over, but don’t expect changes to happen overnight. It will take some time before you can recover, and find strength once again. This means you will be able to regain stability in terms of property, health, relationships, business, or finances.
Slow recovery from illness can be indicated by the Five of Pentacles reversed as well. You will be able to find a treatment that can lead to recovery. If you are caring for someone, then it can mean that help will be made available, whether it is financial or practical assistance.
reversed.love_meaning:
A period of isolation, rejection and despair may be coming to an end. The reversed 5 of Pentacles tarot love meaning can suggest that your relationship or your dating prospects are improving again, as you have worked to prevail over difficult circumstances. As struggles are lightening, you can make steady progress in rekindling your relationship, or opening yourself up to new people.

Reversed Love Meaning
Reversed Career Meaning
Reversed Finances Meaning
improved love life, opening yourself to others
friendship at work, end of work hardships
recovery from loss, saving, paying debts
reversed.career_meaning: If your career or business has been going through problems, the reversed 5 of Pentacles can suggest that there is a light at the end of the tunnel. Things are likely to return back to normal. Difficult situations can now be healed, or you may have found another job that values you for what you do. Look out for any opportunities.
reversed.finances_meaning: Slowly, bit by bit, you may be recovering from a financial loss. You may be paying back debts, or rebuilding an emergency fund after a big loss. Keep up the effort, and you’ll likely find yourself in a place of financial stability again. The worst is over.
reversed.as_feelings:
The arrival of the reversed Five of Pentacles suggests that this person is beginning to see hope and light where there once was darkness. They may have felt isolated or abandoned in the past, but now they are starting to recognize your support and kindness. Their feelings are shifting towards gratitude and appreciation as they realize that you bring warmth into their life, helping them heal from previous struggles.
With regard to your own feelings, this card indicates a sense of recovery from hardship. You might be moving away from feelings of lack or insecurity, finding comfort in new connections or opportunities. This newfound optimism allows you to embrace change and encourages you to open up emotionally, fostering deeper relationships with those around you.
reversed.as_actions: The arrival of the reversed Five of Pentacles suggests that it’s time to shift your perspective on hardship and isolation. Instead of feeling defeated, focus on seeking support and recognizing the resources available to you. This may involve reaching out to friends or family for help, joining a community group, or exploring new opportunities that align with your passions. Embrace gratitude for what you have rather than dwelling on what you lack. Take small steps towards financial stability by budgeting wisely or seeking advice from a mentor. By actively engaging with others and fostering connections, you'll find strength in unity and resilience in adversity.

abyss: The Five of Pentacles shows two people, their expressions full of grief and pain, as they are cast out into the cold, unforgiving night. One of them appears unwell, barely able to stand. There is no room for them, and now they must try to find some other place to take shelter. The Five of Pentacles is a card that implies some form of financial loss or hardship. In some cases, it can even mean illness. Since the Suit of Pentacles deals with the material aspects of life, we need to make sure we’re not only looking at the financial aspects, but also physical health. More often than not, this card relates to financial strain; however, make sure you're also paying attention to your physical well-being. Just as you take care of the house that shelters you, your body also needs to be maintained and cared for.
